events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Pune, India
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download theinfo, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started with Mobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE student Windows Azure six-month subscription!– supplies are limited so be sure to register now!

events.name: Cloud Foundry Open Tour, Pune - Evening Session
events.about:
Schedule and information: http://cloudfoundryopen.com/2012/pune

Dont have a Cloud Foundry account yet?
Sign up now

Use code CFOpenTour2012 for instant approval.

The evening session runs from 3:00pm-8:00pm and includes the following:

  • Cloud Foundry Bootcamp with Josh Long
  • Hackathon
  • Code Lab
  • Demos of Applications, Prizes
  • Dinner & Drinks

There is also a morning session. Registration for the morning session available at http://cloudfoundryopen-pune-morning.eventbrite.com
